get_constituency_from_region2.template: SELECT id, constituency_name, constituency_search FROM coop.uk_open_admin_constituencies_regions WHERE regionname = '${region}' ORDER BY constituency_name;

get_lad_from_region2.template: SELECT id, lad_name, lad_search FROM coop.vw_uk_glx_geodata_admin_lad WHERE regionname = '${region}' ORDER BY lad_name;

gazetteer.placeholder: Search postcode, locale, constituency, local authority, town, county, region or country
